answers.question: What is the route of your application?
What is the scope of your application?
Has the active substance(s) of your product previously been authorised in the UK?
Does your application concern an orphan medicinal product (to which point 6 of part II of annex I to the 2001 Directive applies)?
How many strengths/presentations of the same dosage form are you submitting? (If it is a single submission, please leave it as 0)
